overview: Michael Mertz has extensive experience in high-tech software, hardware and internet video. Before DeHood he was VP Marketing at Vyoom and VP Sales/Biz Dev at Vsolay and Point Marketing. Prior to that he launched numerous complex software products at Verisity and Synopsys. Mike holds a BS-CS/EE from the University of Kansas and an MBA in international finance from the American Graduate School of International Management.
